name: politico
text:
When it comes to the Biden veepstakes, @MarcACaputo says, "There's really only six or seven people in the United States who know what the hell is going on."

He explains what you need to know about four of the top contenders on today's POLITICO Dispatch https://t.co/Wn2aA3WD3r

name: politico
text:

name: politico
text:
Democrats are gearing up to push for changes to a small business aid plan pitched by Republicans as part of the latest economic relief package, as Joe Biden called for major new investments in firms owned by people of color

name: politico
text:
The role of Big Tech in our daily lives has intensified during the Covid-19 crisis.

With Americans out of work and small businesses dying off at a rapid clip, these companies are growing bigger, more dominant, more seemingly unstoppable
https://t.co/gRcEu44Sbc

name: politico
text:
For many older Ukrainians, the toppling of Soviet statues amounts to an erasure of history. 

For younger, pro-European Ukrainians, the removal of monuments to figures they see as oppressors is an important part of setting a new course for the country
https://t.co/BnXHbeMJmt
